raw_text: REV. FR. NALIN SURAJA,​ of the Archdiocese of Colombo,​ expired on Monday the 30th October 2023. He is the beloved son of Mr H.D. Edwin Joseph and Mrs W.D. Irangani Mallika. His remains will lie in state at St. Anthony’s Church,​ Kongodamulla,​ on Wednesday 1st November from 10 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. and thereafter transferred to Our Lady of Good Voyage Church,​ Duwa,​ On Thursday,​ 2nd November at 7.00 p.m. His remains will be taken to St. Joseph’s Church,​ Pamunugama. The Requiem Mass will be held on Friday,​ the 3rd November at 9.30 a.m. followed by burial at the Church Cemetery at Pamunugama. Archbishop’s House,​ Borella.070321

PERERA – MAVIS – Beloved wife of late Ossie,​ loving mother of Romesh and Prithee,​ mother-in-law of Delo and late Ajith,​ grandmother of Ashan,​ Shevi and Anushka,​ great grandmother of Kiara and Keyden,​ sister of Vernon,​ Arlene,​ Ranjith,​ Shiranthi and Rohan. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Friday,​ 3rd November,​ for Burial at 3.00 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.070722

SALLAY – GNEI RUHINA,​ beloved wife of late T.S. Sallay (Tony – Ex Petty Officer,​ SLN,​ loving mother of Jean Handagama (Formerly of Wycherly Intnl.) and late Roshini Silva (Australia),​ M.i.L. of Ravi Handagama and Shane Silva,​ sister of Aniff Ahamed,​ late Selwyn,​ Mervyn,​ late Commander Suraj (Bunny – SLN),​ Ronny & Farina Dole. S.i.L. of Thajudeen Sallay,​ Tuany (Ex-SLN) + Jurathy Sallay,​ Ruvini & Staby,​ late Binky Ahamed,​ late Framy,​ Roja,​ Rehanie,​ Feroza and Anver Dole,​ passed away peacefully on 18th of October,​ 2023. Janaza took place on same day at Dehiwela Jumma Mosque.069872
